title: help streaming with OBS
body:
Old air client lobby can source of OBS game capture.
lobby means lobby has play button, waiting matchmaking, pick/ban etc..

NEW Client lobby can not source of OBS game capture.
Just me or everyone?

in-game stream is fine. but It is sad to wait for the start of the game on black background

replies.body: This is actually a known issue that's being looked into, specifically with OBS not streaming the updated client.  Offer any reports and feedback you can through the client's gear icon, or the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  The client is still in testing so any info can help!

I understand.
Thank you for the reply.
I'll do that next time.
